Room.Name: Caledonia Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is Caledonia Road, which is a major east-west street in Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: Directly west is the Town Square of Brownhaven. Caledonia Road intersects with Main Street over to the east. As you look north, you see the famous Brownhaven Central Library, world famous for its collection of books on magic and alchemy. Of course, the most famous of all alchemists once resided here in Brownhaven, and when his house burned he gave the library the books he salvaged. Khallazar has since moved to somewhere in an enchanted forest.
